entry.title: Out Of Context : My Life As A Teenage Robot : 'Mudpie Factory'

media:group.media:title: Out Of Context : My Life As A Teenage Robot : 'Mudpie Factory'
media:group.media:description:
After an animated 'parody' is created, there is often a lot of audio left on the cutting room floor. It seems a shame to let it all go to waste.
These are lines taken out of context.
Here, Jenny discusses the limitations of her mudpie factory.

entry.title: Out Of Context : Dr Katz : 'Better In Or Out?'

media:group.media:title: Out Of Context : Dr Katz : 'Better In Or Out?'
media:group.media:description:
After an animated 'parody' is created, there is often a lot of audio left on the cutting room floor. It seems a shame to let it all go to waste.
These are lines taken out of context.
Here, Dr Katz and his receptionist, Laura spend some quality time together.
Follow me on Twitter: http://twitter.com/z0ne

media:group.media:title: ZONE-tan Dakimakura
media:group.media:description:
You can do anything with ZONE-tan Dakimakura. Available now in SFW and NSFW variants at http://sharkrobot.com/zone for $29.95
A print of the NSFW design on sale as a limited 30 day run until December 19th 2018 starting at $9.95
We are also going to clearance and discontinue several old t-shirt designs starting at $9.95 each so now is your last chance to pick them up!
Use the promo code BLACKFRIDAY18 until Cyber Monday November 26th 2018 to receive 15% off your entire order.
Shipping is free for US orders over $60 and international orders over $100.
If you want to watch the show about the aliens with six packs, it's called 'Haunted' and it's on Netflix.

media:group.media:title: ZTV News Episode 9 (April 2018)
media:group.media:description:
On ZTV News, ZONE-tan, the mascot for ZONE-Archive responds to feedback and gives news updates for the website.
